body.name: ZINUS 5 Inch Cooling Essential Foam Mattress, Bed-in-a-Box, CertiPUR-US Certified, Twin, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 19 hrs 46 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Durable High Density Foam and a Thermoregulating Poly Jacquard Cover

CLASSIC COMFORT, MAXIMUM AFFORDABILITY – With its special cooling cover, supportive foams, and dependable construction, the Cooling Essential Mattress is the kind that can complete any guest room, kids’ bedroom, or college dorm
SLEEP WITHOUT OVERHEATING – A breathable, cooling cover encourages airflow and keeps you at the optimal body temperature for peaceful sleep
CERTIPUR-US CERTIFIED – Highest quality foam is CertiPUR-US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED – This mattress is efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
body.description: Our Cooling Essential Mattress combines cool comfort with maximum affordability. Made to soothe you to sleep, this supportive foam mattress features an extra line of defense for hot sleepers. The secret to its comfy, cooling success? Cozy layers of supportive Zinus Base Foam™ wrapped in a plush cover that breathes well to help regulate your body temperature while you snooze. Its dependable high-density foam layers are designed with durability and a feel that’s not too soft and not too firm–perfect for all types of sleeping positions. Plus, like all of our mattresses, it arrives at your door compressed and rolled into one compact box. And despite its extremely reasonable price tag, the Cooling Essential Mattress still includes our 10 year worry-free warranty, so you get extra peace of mind when cozying up on top of it. If you’re a fan of sound, comfortable sleep and a good value (like us), then this mattress will live up to your every expectation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meets all wants and expectations!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 6” mattress for my 6 month old. We’re transferring her from co-sleeping. The mattress is very comfortable but nice and firm. She doesn’t even notice when I leave the bed. Definitely recommend to anyone working through the same thing. Or if you just need a good mattress for a twin size bed I really like this one and it’s for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with this. I got the 10 inch one and I love it. It is so comfortable and I don’t wake up with pain anymore. If anything, I wake up and it’s hard to get OUT of bed. It’s perfect firmness if you don’t like too soft or too firm. It fits to YOUR body. The price was even better honestly. I have a queen bed and it’s magical. Best sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality mattress
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my sons room and he loves it, it’s so soft, but firm. Amazing for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Daybed Mattress. One Issue though...
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these mattresses in twin for an extendable day bed. The mattresses are very comfortable. We have had several guests stay on them, all of them sleeping on them in the stacked twin configuration. Not one complaint. Everyone has said they are comfortable. They are lightweight and easy to set up. Just remove it from the box, unroll it, and cut the plastic off carefully. Expands fully within 24 hours, but didn't use them or make the bed for 72 hours, just in case.One issue though. These mattresses came in 2 different deliveries. I noticed the first mattress delivered took a lot longer to expand after being removed from the box than the second mattress. The corners never fully expanded. You can tell from the second picture. The instructions said to open within 72 hours of delivery, and I opened both within ten minutes of them being left at my front door. I suspect one sat in the Amazon warehouse longer than the other mattress. Not worth it to return an expanded mattress to Amazon, but a bit disappointed in the inconsistency. If these mattresses have an "expiration" date, the seller needs to work out it with Amazon so that inventory doesn't age out in the warehouse, and those that are kept beyond "expiration" are sold at a discount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Toddler Floor Bed Mattress
reviews.reviewText: This twin mattress has been a game-changer for our toddler's floor bed! It's the perfect thickness and comfort level, providing just the right balance of softness and firm support. I often find myself sneaking in to lay on it because it's so comfortable! Plus, it's affordable, making it even better. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a quality mattress for their child's floor bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 12” mattress for my son. It was well packaged. Heavier than I expected carrying it up the stairs to the bedroom. I was a little skeptical about this purchase based on reviews that said it smelled (and it was pretty inexpensive on Black Friday), but there was ZERO smell when I unpackaged it and 5 days later still no smell. It came out of the packaging easily and has a nice cover over it that can be removed to wash. I let it inflate for 48 hours before I even touched it. The end of the bed that was rolled up to the inside in the packaging looked like it didn’t inflate all the way so I turned it around (thinking maybe the wall that end was sitting against was too cold ) and it still didn’t inflate all the way - let it sit 2 more days and made sure the cover wasn’t too tight and that did the trick. The bed is on the firm side, but not too firm. If you’re looking for a memory foam you sink into this is not for you. I haven’t done more than lay in it and found it comfortable, felt good laying flat on my back after 14 hours at work. My little one just slept for 10 straight hours and said it was “like a cloud” so I’m taking that as a win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the thickest one
reviews.reviewText: For the cost, I can’t complain. But I wish I would have spent more to get the thicker one. We bought my son the same mattress 2 years ago & it’s still holding up well, more on the firm side but soft enough. I thought I ordered the same thickness but apparently not. I ordered the 10” for my guest room but it’s too soft for an adult.***They should put on the box to open right away. There’s a note INSIDE of the sealed box that says to open & air up for 48-72 right away but I waited a week & one of the shorter side’s didn’t air up evenly. It’s vacuum sealed so the sooner you open it, the better apparently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good if you like a firm mattress
reviews.reviewText: Mattress was packaged very well. We were able to take it out of the box, in its airtight sealed plastic, and get it into the bedroom. Then opening the plastic, it immediately began to puff out to size. We opened it around 6am and by 6pm it appeared to be to full size. It seemed firm yet cushy and sleeping on it for the first time felt great, until waking in the morning. My husband loved it, but my back cannot handle how firm it is. I wanted to give it some time for my body to adjust but still after a few weeks it is still so firm that I decided to order a soft mattress topper for it. I am having better sleep on the couch than I am in this bed but hoping that the topper will comfort my back… overall the mattress is made well and appears to be good quality. Since my husband likes it I am giving 3 stars but my the sake of my back, its a no go for me…
Paired with Zinus frame. Relatively quiet and firm. Hasn't lost form yet. No odor. Should have opted for larger size.

It's a wonderful mattress for an excellent value!! The best mattress i've ever purchased honestly. My son sleeps well and he's rested in the morning. It contours to your body, and it's soft but still has stiffness somehow. The best mattress on the market in my opinion. Came tightly packed in a tall box and it didn't take long to inflate all the way. I had no issues with it, and with a matress protector it will be good for a long time to come. I purchased one for myself and for my mother as well that's how good the quality is, and the price is so reasonable. 1000% recommend. Your back will thank you

reviews.reviewTitle: doesn’t get as big as it says it will
reviews.reviewText: i bought this bed and threw out my oldone thinking it’ll be the perfect bed but i can feel the bed frame while i try and lay down. still waiting on a new bed but i put a foamy mattress on top of this for me to sleep at night

reviews.reviewTitle: Better option for a top bunk! You need rails to be above the mattress.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 8" version in twin for my daughter's bunk bed not thinking about the mattress height and how it effectively makes the safety railing shorter.I have the 8" on the bottom and the 5" now replaced the top mattress. I'm 175 lbs and 5'11" and I find both to be very comfortable. I also have the 12" queen version for myself and it's fantastic too. If these are just for kids I definitely think the 5" one is good enough. Only people who are heavier would need the thicker 8" or 12" versions in my opinion. Definitely measure your bunk bed top rail and make sure you are in safety requirements before ordering any mattress for the top.
